## Logging.LogReporter class

Abstract base class which wraps an existing [ILogger](./ts-utils.logging.ilogger.md) to implement both [ILogger](./ts-utils.logging.ilogger.md) and [IResultReporter](./ts-utils.iresultreporter.md)<!-- -->.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export declare class LogReporter<T, TD = unknown> implements ILogger, IResultReporter<T, TD> 
```
**Implements:** [ILogger](./ts-utils.logging.ilogger.md)<!-- -->, [IResultReporter](./ts-utils.iresultreporter.md)<!-- -->&lt;T, TD&gt;
